attributes.action: Confine HGV's to the nearside lane on Motorways and dual carriageways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lories cause no end of delays and congestion on motorways by overtaking each other when travelling at 56 mph with a speed difference of less than a mile a month. Confining them to the inside lane will cause less congestion and delay to other road users.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
